properties.areaDesc: Sheridan Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Beartooth Foothills; Southern Big Horn; Red Lodge Foothills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:05AM MST until February 9 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.
Locally higher amounts possible along the foothills.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. In Montana, Red Lodge
Foothills, Beartooth Foothills, Southern Big Horn and Bighorn
Canyon.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions due to snow and
poor visibility. Localized blowing snow could reduce visibility
at times.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY
